items.title: Thomson Reuters Reports First-Quarter 2018 Results
items.author: Thomson Reuters News Releases
items.description: TORONTO , May 11, 2018 /CNW/ --  Thomson Reuters (TSX/NYSE: TRI) today reported results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018 . The company also issued a full-year 2018 Outlook for its continuing operations and announced a new $500 million share repurchase program.
items.content: TORONTO , May 11, 2018 /CNW/ --  Thomson Reuters (TSX/NYSE: TRI) today reported results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018 . The company also issued a full-year 2018 Outlook for its continuing operations and announced a new $500 million share repurchase program.
